title: India set for stronger tech, media and telecom IPOs as China falters - Business Standard
content: India set for stronger tech, media and telecom IPOs as China falters  Business Standard
description: Between 2018 and 2020, there were 15 TMT IPOs in India. Last year alone, 15 Indian TMT companies went public and raised a total proceeds of $4.8 billion, reveals data and analytics company GlobalData
